tool_description: API provides you with the ability to send a text message, video message or image at the highest speed and easy to use
name: Whatsapp API
title: Whatsapp API

api_list.name: Send Button With Media
api_list.description: Send an interactive template message with media to WhatsApp User.

api_list.name: Send Text Message
api_list.description: Send a text message to WhatsApp User or Group.

required_parameters.name: instance_id
required_parameters.description: If you do not have  instance id please go to running instance.

api_list.name: Send Image Message
api_list.description: Send an image message to WhatsApp User.

api_list.name: Send Contact Message
api_list.description: Send an contact(vcard) message to an WhatsApp User.
